text: Jean-Louis Borloo (born 1951) is a French politician.Tapie, Valenciennes, banlieues... les mille vies de Jean-Louis Borloo He was Minister of Social Affairs between 2004 and 2007, Minister of Economy and Finance in 2007 and Minister of the Environment between 2007 and 2010.Jean-Louis BORLOO Boorlo earned a degree in law and philosophy at the Université Panthéon-Sorbonne in 1972, in 1974 a further degree in history and economics at the Université Paris X: Nanterre, and in 1976 an MBA at HEC Paris.Jean-Louis Borloo == References == Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:Businesspeople from Paris Category:Government ministers of France
title: Jean-Louis Borloo
